Class FileTranslator

java.lang.Object
FileTranslator
public class FileTranslator extends Object
FileTranslator class is for reading the text file. It is again specifically meant to read the UserData.txt file.
Author:
Patrick Palmroos

  • Method Details

    • fileToList

      public static ArrayList<UserInfo> fileToList()
      fileToList reads the text file and turns the users on it into an ArrayList.
      Returns:
      the saved users from the txt file in an ArrayList.

    • contactCount

      public static int contactCount()
      Used to count the amount of users within the txt file.
      Returns:
      the amount of users on the file.

    • skipLines

      public static void skipLines(Scanner s, int desiredLine)
      Used to skip lines in the text file.
      Parameters:
      s - is the scanner class
      desiredLine - is the line we want to move to.

    • setUserInfo

      public static ArrayList<UserInfo> setUserInfo(Scanner sc, int skipToLine, ArrayList<UserInfo> list)
      Sets the info from the file into an UserInfo object and sends it back.
      Parameters:
      sc - is the passed scanner class
      skipToLine - is the line we want to skip to
      list - is the ArrayList which this object is added to
      Returns:
      the changed ArrayList

    • listToString

      public static String listToString(ArrayList<UserInfo> userList)
      Turns the ArrayList into text format. this is used for saving the info onto the new file in DataWriter class.
      Parameters:
      userList - is the ArrayList with UserInfo objects in it
      Returns:
      the list turned into text format readable by this app.
